data.name: MatchyGotchy Pack
data.detailed_description:
MatchyGotchy Pack is part of the latest game update for MatchyGotchy. We have improved the free build according to user feedback and reviews, tweaking and including content where needed. This includes technical updates such as cloud save, soft and hard reset, and settings changes as well as cosmetic changes such as colorful ships, notifications, and a special reward for reaching Xanadu.

This DLC is intended as a developer support pack for those who have enjoyed MatchyGotchy and would like to help us continue working on the Matchyverse. We are currently working on MatchyGotchy Z and Matchy Star, so your help will certainly make a difference.

As a thank you, we decided to include in this DLC pack:



  • Pack Manual: a visual guide to the contents of the MatchyGotchy Pack. PDF.
  • Game Development Stories: a short game design document of how MatchyGotchy was created. Downloadable Comic PDF.
  • MatchyGotchy Star Booklet: character profiles of all 7 rocket surgeons as a digital Booklet paper model. Printable Papercraft PDF.
  • MatchyGotchy Diorama: three dimensional laboratory playset paper model including all 7 Stars. Printable Papercraft PDF.
  • Silverware Games Stand: paper design to display your diorama at all times on your desktop. Printable Papercraft PDF.

Also included:

  • MatchyGotchy becoming part of your Steam library forever.
  • Our heartfelt gratitude for being so kind and supporting the Matchyverse.



Papercrafts are recommended for everyone of all ages, however, we recommend having an adult assist; if you are already an adult, then feel free to get an adultier adult. All you need for the papercraft is regular paper, scissors, and glue sticks.

Once you have bought the DLC, check out this Steam Support article for how to access your content. If you need further assistance please contact us. Also, please share your creations with us on Twitter, Facebook and Instagram by using #MatchyGotchy



Thank you for being part of the Matchyverse!

data.short_description: MatchyGotchy Pack is a downloadable papercraft based on the free game MatchyGotchy. MatchyGotchy Pack DLC is intended as a developer support pack for those who have enjoyed MatchyGotchy and would like to support us while we continue working on the Matchyverse.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7+
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ 2 Duo / AMD® Athlon™
  • Graphics: 2 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 512 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX® 11 compatible
